1511771230_18mEN3ZbnkPSNQDXS94NhX9w9qunJ.body: There is an app called HelloTalk on both Android and ios, it was meant to help people learning each others' languages more quickly. But it needs the participants pouring more energy into maintaining schedules than meeting a partner in real life, so most of the people abandoned it after several weeks of trying to do the right thing.

1511662798_1PdVrw7boKHUavWTQxD3UaNGM4tx5.body: When I was alone I felt that I loved this world, but when I with other people I felt so hurtful that I hated this world so much, I wished I could die due to depression.

> [ghostofthepast](#comment_3_1LtFqzCrfXwPYCHH6HJUs8Pv9Zit67iKYw): Then I'm fucked. It makes me eat like shit. I can barely move if i do get out of bed. I haven't had a single friend in years. I don't travel further than my own room. I don't sleep at night because when i close my eyes i think I'm drowning. Ive learned that hell isn't something you experience when your dead. My existence is hell. This is my punishment. I deserve it too.

Is there somewhere you can go, and get socialized with other people? I think may be you are just too lonely?
